channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: WA World Athletics Championships
channel.desc: There are four world titles on offer on day three of the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo, but all eyes will be on Mondo Duplantis. The Olympic champion has already broken his own world record this season - can he do it again in the National Stadium and claim a third world title? 400m hurdle world record holder Karsten Warholm is also in action in the heats.
